name: Wayward Bones
description:
Prompt: "Journey Into the Unknown"

Team #4 - Team Bossil

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

This is Worm!

Worm wants to see a dinosaur! He's never seen one in real life. So he'll dig underground to find fossils and make one himself!
